name: Terraforming Mars inserts
description: Precision-crafted inserts for Terraforming Mars. Every tile, cube, and card gets its own slot — setup in under a minute, cleanup in seconds.

name: Wingspan inserts with magnets
description: Magnetic-close inserts for Wingspan with all three expansions (European, Oceania, Asia). Keeps eggs, food tokens, and bird cards perfectly organized between sessions.

specs.compatibility: Wingspan with expansions (European, Oceana and Asia)

name: Sky Team inserts
description: Compact inserts for Sky Team with Turbulence expansion. Everything stays snug in the box — no more rattling components on the shelf.

name: Codenames Travel Box
description: A slim travel box for Codenames — fits all cards and tiles in a pocket-friendly package. Perfect for game nights away from home.

name: Terraforming Mars Overlay Mats
description: Snap-fit overlay mats that sit on top of your Terraforming Mars player boards. No more accidentally bumping your cubes out of place mid-game.

name: Card & Resource Tray - 4 Small Slots
description: A 4-slot tray that keeps cards and resources tidy at the table. Slim enough to pass around, sturdy enough for everyday use.

name: Meeple Shaped Stackable Resource Tray
description: A playful meeple-shaped tray that stacks neatly when not in use. Great for holding tokens, coins, or small resources during any game.

name: Stackable Hexagon Token Tray
description: Hexagonal trays that stack securely when not in use. Ideal for sorting tokens, dice, and small components across multiple games.

name: Wingspan 3D Food Tokens
description: Detailed 3D food tokens to replace the cardboard originals in Wingspan. Five types — worm, wheat, berry, fish, and mouse — each in a distinct color for quick identification.

specs.compatibility: Wingspan - base game and all expansions

name: 7 Wonders Duel Travel Box
description: A pocket-sized travel box for 7 Wonders Duel. Holds all components securely so you can take your favorite two-player game anywhere.

name: 7 Wonders Duel Inserts (All Expansions)
description: Inserts for 7 Wonders Duel with Pantheon and Agora expansions. Dedicated slots for every card, token, and tile — nothing left loose in the box.

specs.compatibility: 7 Wonders Duel with Pantheon and Agora expansions

name: Cascadia Inserts
description: Clean inserts for Cascadia that organize all habitat tiles, wildlife tokens, and scoring cards. Speeds up setup so you can start playing sooner.

name: Clank! Catacombs Token Holder
description: A purpose-built holder for Clank! Catacombs tokens. Keeps everything sorted and within reach during those tense dungeon runs.

name: Decrypto Inserts
description: Tidy inserts for Decrypto that organize all code cards, screens, and tokens. No more digging through a jumbled box before game night.

name: Stackable Funnel Tray
description: A lightweight funnel tray for pouring tokens, cubes, and beads back into bags or containers. Stackable and surprisingly handy at the table.

name: Resource Tray - 6 Slots
description: A roomy 6-slot tray for sorting resources, tokens, and bits during gameplay. Each section is sized to keep things separated and easy to grab.

name: Card & Resource Tray - 3 Medium Slots
description: A versatile 3-slot tray sized for cards and medium resources. Works with virtually any game that needs a bit of table organization.

name: Stackable Resource Tray - 2 Slots
description: A simple two-slot tray for separating beads, tokens, or resources. Compact and useful — the kind of thing you end up wanting multiples of.

name: Brass Birmingham Inserts
description: Inserts for Brass Birmingham with a dedicated slot for every player mat, card stack, tile, and token. Makes setup and teardown a breeze for this heavyweight classic.

name: Lost Ruins of Arnak Inserts (All Expansions)
description: Comprehensive inserts for Lost Ruins of Arnak with all expansions. Base game and expansion components each have their own space — no more sorting through a shared pile.

specs.compatibility: Lost Ruins of Arnak with all expansions

name: Viticulture Inserts (All Expansions)
description: Inserts for Viticulture with all major expansions — Essential Edition, Tuscany, Bordeaux, Moor Visitors, Rhine Valley, metal coins, and sleeved cards. Does not include Viticulture Worlds.

specs.compatibility: Viticulture Essential Edition, Tuscany Essential Edition, Bordeaux, Moor Visitors, Visit from the Rhine Valley, Metal Coins, Sleeved Cards (excludes Viticulture Worlds)

name: Castle Dice Tower
description: A castle-themed dice tower that adds flair to every roll. Drop dice in the top, they tumble through internal baffles, and land fairly every time.

name: Draw & Discard Tray - 63mm x 89mm cards
description: A clean two-section tray for draw and discard piles. Fits standard and sleeved cards — keeps your table neat during any card-heavy game.

name: Hexagonal Dice Tray
description: A hexagonal dice tray with a geometric low-poly base. Keeps dice from flying off the table and looks great doing it.

name: Smash Castle Dice Tower
description: A bold, oversized castle dice tower that makes every roll feel dramatic. A real conversation starter on game night.

name: Catan Cities & Knights Player Token Holder with Lid
description: A compact holder for all Catan Cities & Knights player pieces — cities, settlements, roads, and knights neatly organized in one tray with a color-coded lid.

name: 3-Row Playing Card Holder
description: A curved three-row card holder that fans your hand out neatly. Great for kids, accessibility, or anyone juggling a big hand of cards.

name: Lords of Waterdeep Skull Tokens (25 Pack)
description: A set of 25 detailed 3D-printed skull tokens for the Scoundrels of Skullport expansion. Replaces the cardboard corruption tokens with satisfyingly tactile miniatures.

specs.compatibility: Lords of Waterdeep: Scoundrels of Skullport

name: Twilight Imperium Inserts
description: A massive multi-tray organizer for Twilight Imperium (4th Edition).

name: Old King's Crown Inserts (All Expansions)
description:
Variable inserts for Old King's Crown — fits all core and expansion components into a single box with minimal lift, or splits neatly between the core and expansion boxes with no lift at all. Supports premium sleeves and vertical storage.

Core box solution: all 3 layers go in the box, followed by the various boards, documents, and finally the game board.

2-box solution: middle layer goes in the expansion box with Simulacrum documents. Bottom and top layers go in the core box with the remaining components.

specs.compatibility: Old King's Crown - core + all expansions

name: Bomb Busters Inserts
description: Custom inserts for Bomb Busters with dedicated slots for every card, tile, and token. Quick setup, clean teardown — everything stays organized between games.

name: Bomb Busters Tile Holder
description: A purpose-built tile holder for Bomb Busters. Keeps tiles upright and easy to browse during gameplay — no more fumbling through face-down stacks.

name: Cubitos Inserts (with Expansions)
description: Inserts for Cubitos designed to fit the Fowl Play expansion along with the GeekUp Storage Bin Set. If you don't have the GeekUp bins, a custom-designed display bin is included. Lids are only needed for the 2 bins with their tops exposed. Supports sleeved cards.

specs.compatibility: Cubitos + Fowl Play expansion + GeekUp Box Set

name: Deep Sea Adventure Inserts
description: Compact inserts for Deep Sea Adventure. Keeps all the treasure tokens, dice, and diver pieces snug in the tiny box — perfect for this pocket-sized push-your-luck classic.

name: Bomb Busters Premium Tile Holder
description: A premium labeled tile holder for Bomb Busters with individual A–P slots. Keeps all 16 tiles sorted and instantly accessible during gameplay.

name: Mountain Goats Inserts
description: Custom inserts for Mountain Goats with individual trays for each player's goat pieces, dice holders, and card slots. Keeps all the colorful components sorted and ready to play.

name: 2-Slot Card Stand - 20cm long
description: A straight two-slot card stand that holds cards upright for easy viewing. Perfect for games with tableau or display cards — keeps them visible without taking up table space.

name: Splendor Inserts
description: Full inserts for Splendor with dedicated slots for all gem token stacks, card tiers, and noble tiles. Everything fits snugly in the original box — open and play in seconds.

name: Splendor Travel Case
description: A compact branded travel case for Splendor that holds all cards and gem tokens in a portable package. Take your favorite engine-builder anywhere.

name: Mountain Goat Meeple
description: A chunky 3D-printed goat meeple to upgrade or replace the original Mountain Goats pieces. Cute, tactile, and fun to place on the mountain peaks.

name: Ticket to Ride Trains Tray
description: Order saperatly for different colors. A slim tray to hold your train cars during a game of Ticket to Ride. Keeps your pieces organized and easy to grab when claiming routes.

name: Ticket to Ride Trains & Station Organizer
description: Order saperatly for different colors. An all-in-one organizer for Ticket to Ride that holds trains and station pieces together. Each player's set stays sorted and ready for the next game.

name: Ticket to Ride Trains Storage
description: Order saperatly for different colors. A dedicated storage tray for Ticket to Ride train cars. Keeps all player colors separated in the box so setup is instant next time.

name: Cosmic Encounter Inserts with Dominion & Incursion Expansions
description: It will be in single color. Image is for reference only. Full inserts for Cosmic Encounter with Dominion and Incursion expansions. Organizes all alien sheets, cards, ships, and tokens with dedicated compartments — fits everything back in the original box.

specs.compatibility: Cosmic Encounter with Dominion & Incursion expansions
